mapper.select: select slideshow_good_code goodCode, slideshow_route slideshowRoute from t_sys_slideshow where is_delete = 0 and slideshow_state = 1 order by slideshow_sort

select h.good_code goodCode, h.good_name goodName, g.pictureUrl pictureUrl, g.sell_price sellPrice from t_sys_hot_good as h, t_sys_goods as g where h.good_code = h.good_code and h.is_delete = 0 order by h.hot_sort
